alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Blanco; Comal; Hays; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 11:58PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hays, southern Blanco, central Kendall, north central Bexar and central Comal Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bergheim, or 9 miles northeast of Boerne, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boerne, Wimberley, Blanco, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Fair Oaks Ranch, Bulverde, Johnson City, Woodcreek, Walnut Grove, Guadalupe River State Park, Kendalia, Smithson Valley, Sisterdale, Kreutzberg, Spring Branch, Welfare, Payton, Flugrath, and Fischer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Texas.
